lng.description: The locale identifier corresponding to the language of the translation.
lng.title: Locale identifier

locale.description: The corrected locale identifier corresponding to the language of the translation. This identifier can be used in Sigma's query parameters (ex. `:lng=en-gb`)
locale.title: Locale identifier

lng_variant.description: The name of the custom translation variant, if applicable
lng_variant.title: Variant name

createdBy.description: The user ID of the creator

updatedBy.description: The user ID of the last updater
